title: Curvaceous and playful italic display typeface
content:
Hi all,

A client found this very curvy typeface used in this logo and is keen for me to use this or something similar in a project.

Any help pointing me in the right direction would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Scarf_500_6096.jpg)

Font: 

 Domaine Display 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083224/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: Derek_Evans

comments.content:
It looks like it’s based on Domaine Display.  
 [https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083224/https:/klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/ "https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/")

Perfect! Has a little more structure to it which works for me.

Much appreciated.
